name: Email Confirmation
subject: Email Confirmation
description: Includes a PIN code customer is expected to input to confirm this email.
trigger: Triggered during the buy flow to verify email address.

name: SMS Confirmation
description: Includes a PIN code customer is expected to input to confirm mobile number.
trigger: Triggered during the buy flow to verify mobile number.

name: Welcome (HW)
subject: Welcome to magicJack
description: Welcome email after successful sign up to service when devices have been ordered. Include TOS as attachment.
trigger: Triggered after successful sign up to service.

name: Welcome (no HW)
subject: Welcome to magicJack
description: Welcome email after successful sign up to service when NO devices ordered. We don't have mobile only so this is not sent today.
trigger: Triggered after successful sign up to service for mobile only.

name: Admin Password
subject: Temporary password for magicJack Admin Zone
description: Includes a random password generated for the account admin to allow portal mobile access (auth0).
trigger: Sent when an Agent makes an order from Salesforce.

name: E911 Disclosure
subject: E911 Address Confirmation for magicJack for BUSINESS and E911 Disclosure
description: Sent along side welcome emails. Include current e911 address on file + e911 disclosure as PDF.
trigger: Triggered after successful sign up to service.

name: Order shipped
subject: Your order has shipped!
description: Sent when devices are being shipped out from NETXUSA.
trigger: Sent when devices are being shipped out from NETXUSA.

name: User (Extension) Password Welcome
subject: Welcome to magicJack
description: Sent when admin assigns a new user to a line.
trigger: Sent when admin or agent assigns a new user to a line.

name: E911 Address Missing
subject: E911 Address is missing, Please read E911 Disclosure
description: Mainly for legacy customers. This is sent in case some modification was performed on a line we don't have an E911 address for.
trigger: Sent when system detect E911 missing for a line.

name: E911 Update
subject: E911 Address Update notification for magicJack for BUSINESS
description: This email confirms the E911 address update.
trigger: Sent every time an admin or user updates an e911 address on a line.

name: Telephone Number Update (Ext)
subject: Telephone Number Update for magicJack for BUSINESS
description: Confirms a telephone number update.
trigger: Sent when a customer care agent uses SFDC to update a Telephone Number on an ext. line.

name: Telephone Number Update (AA)
subject: Telephone Number Update for magicJack for BUSINESS
description: Confirms a telephone number update.
trigger: Sent when a customer care agent uses SFDC to update a Telephone Number on an Auto Attendant line.

name: Telephone Number Update (Fax)
subject: Telephone Number Update for magicJack for BUSINESS
description: Confirms a telephone number update.
trigger: Sent when a customer care agent uses SFDC to update a Telephone Number on an Fax line.

name: International Calls Enable
subject: International Call Enable for magicJack for BUSINESS
description: This Email Confirms that International Calls are Enabled
trigger: Sent when a customer care agent uses SFDC to enable international calls.

name: Transfer Request Accepted
subject: Transfer Request Received
description: This email states that the portout request has been accepted.
trigger: Sent when the portout request has been accepted.

name: Change Password
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Password Change Request
description: Allows a user to reset their password.
trigger: Sent when a user presses "Forgot Password" from Desktop App, Web Portal or Mobile Apps.

name: Sent Fax
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Fax Sent
description: Notification to alert users that their fax was sent successfully.

name: Received Fax
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Fax Received
description: Notification to alert users that they have received a new fax.

name: Unsuccessful Fax
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Fax Unsuccessful
description: Notification to alert users that their fax was not sent.

name: Unknown Sender
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Unknown Sender
description: Notification to alert users that we were not able to locate the email account they're trying to fax from for the fax service.

name: Voicemail
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - New Voicemail
description: Notification to alert users that they have received a new voicemail.

name: Initial Email
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} <{!Case.Thread_Id__c}>
description: Informs users of their responsibilities to begin the portin process. Includes a link to the port in case with customer facing form asking for losing carrier details.
trigger: Sent if customer opted to port a number in. Also sent if a customer care agent initiates port in on behalf of the customer.

name: Corrections Required
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} <{!Case.Thread_Id__c}>
description: Notification to users regarding incorrect or missing details needed to begin the portin process. It includes information about what the customer is expected to fix or provide, and a link to the case.
trigger: Sent when a customer care agent, or portin compliance team have reviewed the details provided by the customer, but found some details to be wrong or missing.

name: Portin Started
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Port_In_Request__c.Case_Number__c}: {!Port_In_Request__c.Case_Subject__c} <{!Port_In_Request__c.Thread_Id__c}>
description: This email states that we have started the portin process for the requested ported number, from the losing carrier name.
trigger: Sent when all the required data to start portin has been provided and validated, and the portin process has started.

name: Portin Completed
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Port_In_Request__c.Case_Number__c}: {!Port_In_Request__c.Case_Subject__c} <{!Port_In_Request__c.Thread_Id__c}>
description: This email states that the portin process has been completed.
trigger: Sent when the portin process has been completed.

name: Initial Email
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} <{!Case.Thread_Id__c}>
description: Informs users of their responsibilities to begin the portin process. Includes a link to the port in case with customer facing form asking for losing carrier details.
trigger: Sent if customer opted to port a number in. Also sent if a customer care agent initiates port in on behalf of the customer.

name: Corrections Required
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} <{!Case.Thread_Id__c}>
description: Notification to users regarding incorrect or missing details needed to begin the portin process. It includes information about what the customer is expected to fix or provide, and a link to the case.
trigger: Sent when a customer care agent, or portin compliance team have reviewed the details provided by the customer, but found some details to be wrong or missing.

name: Portin Started
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Port_In_Request__c.Case_Number__c}: {!Port_In_Request__c.Case_Subject__c} <{!Port_In_Request__c.Thread_Id__c}>
description: This email states that we have started the portin process for the requested ported number, from the losing carrier name.
trigger: Sent when all the required data to start portin has been provided and validated, and the portin process has started.

name: Portin Completed
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Port_In_Request__c.Case_Number__c}: {!Port_In_Request__c.Case_Subject__c} <{!Port_In_Request__c.Thread_Id__c}>
description: This email states that the portin process has been completed.
trigger: Sent when the portin process has been completed.

name: Case Auto Response
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} <{!Case.Thread_Id__c}>
description: Informs users that a case with Customer Care has been created.
trigger: Sent when a customer creates a new case from FAQ, Web to Case.

name: Case Agent Response (not used)
description: This is a response email sent by agents.
trigger: Sent by agents in salesforce

name: Auto Pay - Failure
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Payment Failed
description: Informs users that we were not able to process their credit card payment.
trigger: Sent when rev.io was not able to charge the customer's credit card.

name: Auto Pay - Success
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Payment Notification
description: Informs users that we received their credit card payment.
trigger: Sent when rev.io successfully received the auto-payment from the customer's credit card.

name: Bill Notification
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Your monthly invoice
description: Informs users that they have a new invoice.
trigger: Sent when a new bill invoice has been generated.

name: Credit Card Expiration
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Credit Card Expiration
description: Informs users that their credit card is about to expire.
trigger: Sent 1 month before credit card expiration date.

name: Payment Success
subject: magicJack for BUSINESS - Payment Notification
description: Informs users that payment processed.
trigger: Sent when a customer care agent manually processed a payment.

name: Collection Process Starting
subject: WARNING - magicJack for BUSINESS Phone Service Payment OUTSTANDING
description: Informs users that they have an outstanding balance due.
trigger: This is the first point at which customer enteres the collection queue. this happens 1 day after the auto-debit day, meaning 1 or 2 attempts to charge the credit card have failed.

name: Collection Service Suspension
subject: SERVICE SUSPENSION - magicJack for BUSINESS Phone Service
description: Informs users that their service is scheduled for suspension.
trigger: Payments are still failing 5 days after the expected due date. Rev.io are still hitting the payment method every day.

name: Collection Account Terminated
subject: FINAL NOTICE - magicJack for BUSINESS Account Closed
description: Informs users that their account has been closed.
trigger: Payments are still failing 55 days after the expected due date.

name: Let's get started!
subject: Let's get started!
description: Helping our users to get started using our service.
trigger: Sent on the day 3 after sign-up, if still active.

name: How can we help?
subject: How can we help?
description: Helps our users find answers.
trigger: Sent on the day 5 after sign-up, if still active.

name: Tips for a better communications experience.
subject: Tips for a better communications experience
description: Provides some tips to help our users make the most of our service.
trigger: Sent on the day 10 after sign-up, if still active.

name: Referral Program
subject: Checking In and Introducing our Referral Program
description: Informs users about the referral program benefits
trigger: Sent on the day 60 after sign-up, if still active

name: Ready to stop overpaying for phone service?
subject: Hey {contactfield=firstname} quick question

name: A simple phone solution is an option.
subject: {contactfield=contactid}, don't you think simple is better?

name: Does your phone solution serve your businessâ€™ unique needs?
subject: {contactfield=contactid} are your business needs unique?

name: mJB CSR
description: PDF generated for agent to send to customer
trigger: Manually generated by agents from SF

name: mJB Quote
description: Quote PDF stored in S3 and sent to customers via Mautic as link
trigger: by customers from Quote site

name: mJB Quote
subject: Your Price Quote from magicJack for BUSINESS
description: download the PDF by pressing on the button in the email.
trigger: Triggered when the quote form is submitted. Get a Quote
